name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Results-oriented Field Service Engineer with expertise in the installation, maintenance, and repair of **genetic analysis systems**. Demonstrated proficiency in quality verification and qualification, including IQOQ and OQPQ processes, ensuring compliance with CSV standards. Adept at providing exceptional customer support, diagnostics, and user training, coupled with strong organizational and analytical skills. Tech-savvy with experience in leveraging **digital tools** and **service software** to implement **mobile applications** and **KI-supported solutions** for enhanced operational efficiency. A collaborative team player who can work independently, armed with excellent communication skills, committed to delivering solutions that align with client needs. Previously demonstrated success as a Full Stack Developer with 13+ years in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, proficient in both frontend and backend frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, with comprehensive knowledge of microservices and CI/CD pipelines.
